hero.title: Manage your finances in a SMART way
hero.subtitle: Take control of your finances and save more with our platform

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Profit&Lost is designed to be simple, intuitive, and powerful. Here's how you can take control of your finances in just a few steps:

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and set up your profile with your preferences

step2.title: Add Your Categories and Transactions
step2.description: Start adding your income and expenses. Profit&Lost automatically organizes them into your chosen categories.

step3.title: Visualize & Analyze
step3.description: Use our monthly and annual graphs to see where your money goes and make smarter financial decisions.

step4.title: Achieve Your Goals
step4.description: Set financial goals, track your progress, and watch your savings grow. Profit&Lost is here to help you succeed.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Discover all the tools you need to manage your finances effectively

annualReport.title: Annual Report
annualReport.description: Visualize your annual expenses with monthly graphs and detailed category analysis. Stay on top of your finances all year round.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Manage your monthly expenses with intuitive category and income vs. expense graphs. Know exactly where your money goes.

goals.title: Goals
goals.description: Set and achieve your financial goals with smart tracking. Save for what matters most.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Keep important notes and reminders about your personal finances. Never miss a detail.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Monitor your total account balance with a visual representation of your net worth. All your finances, in one place.

investments.title: Investments
investments.description: Monitor your investments and analyze their performance over time. Make smarter financial decisions.

bankIntegration.title: Bank Integration
bankIntegration.description: Connect your bank accounts to Profit&Lost and automatically import your transactions. Save time and stay organized.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing for everyone
pricing.trial: Try all Premium features free for 30 days — No credit card required

footer.description: Profit&Lost is more than an app—it's your partner in financial growth. From tracking expenses to planning for the future, we're here to help you every step of the way.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Profit&Lost. All rights reserved. Developed by

responsible.title: 1. Responsible for the Treatment
responsible.subtitle: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679:

information.title: 2. Information we collect
information.subtitle: In Profit&Lost, we collect and process:
items: Identifying data: email and username
Financial data voluntarily introduced
Usage and analytical data
Technical and analytical cookies
IP address and browser data
Payment data: information necessary to process your subscription payments, securely stored by our payment processor.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal basis for the treatment
legalBasis.subtitle: We process your personal data based on:
items: The execution of the service contract (Art. 6.1.b RGPD)
Your explicit consent (Art. 6.1.a RGPD)
Our legitimate interest in improving our services (Art. 6.1.f RGPD)
Compliance with legal obligations (Art. 6.1.c RGPD)

purpose.title: 4. Purpose of the Treatment
purpose.subtitle: Your data will be processed with the following specific purposes:
items: Manage your account and provide our services
Process and visualize your financial data
Improve and personalize your experience
Send communications about the service
Comply with legal obligations
Fraud prevention and platform security
Statistical analysis and service improvement

rights.title: 5. ARCO+ Rights
rights.subtitle: You can exercise your rights of:
items: Access to your personal data
Rectification of inaccurate data
Cancellation (deletion) of your data
Opposition to the treatment
Limitation of the treatment
Portability of your data
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact support@profit-lost.com. You also have the right to make a complaint to the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es).

retention.title: 6. Data retention
retention.subtitle: We will retain your personal data while:
items: Maintain an active account
Necessary to comply with legal obligations
Necessary to protect our legal interests

security.title: 7. Security measures
security.subtitle: We implement technical and organizational measures appropriate to ensure an adequate level of security, including:
items: Data encryption
Restricted access to personal data
Regular backups
Security monitoring

minors.title: 8. Minors
minors.content: Our services are not directed at individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If you become aware that a minor has provided us with personal information, please contact us and we will delete this information.

dataTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
dataTransfers.content: Your data is primarily stored and processed within the European Economic Area (EEA). In cases where data may be transferred outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards through Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission or other legally approved mechanisms.

accessibility.title: 10. Accessibility
accessibility.content: We are committed to making our services accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. Our application is designed to be compatible with common assistive technologies and follows WCAG 2.1 accessibility guidelines where possible.

californiaRights.title: 11. California Residents' Rights
californiaRights.content: If you are a California resident, you may have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA), including the right to know what personal information we collect, the right to delete your personal information, the right to opt-out of sale of your personal information, and the right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights.
californiaRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@profit-lost.com.

modifications.title: 12. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Changes will be published on this page and, in case of substantial modifications, we will notify you via email.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of the Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Profit&Lost, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree with any part of the terms, you will not be able to access the service.

description.title: 2. Service description
description.content: Profit&Lost is a web application for the management and visualization of personal financial data. The service is provided "as is" and "as available".

registration.title: 3. Registration and Account
items: The registration information must be accurate and up-to-date
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
You must not share your access credentials

europeanRights.title: 4. European User Rights
europeanRights.subtitle: According to EU legislation, you have the right to:
items: Cancel your subscription within 14 days after the purchase
Receive all the information about the service in a clear and understandable way
Access, correct or delete your personal data
Present a complaint to the competent data protection authority
Resolve disputes through the ODR platform of the EU (Online Dispute Resolution)

conflictResolution.title: 5. Conflict Resolution in the EU
conflictResolution.subtitle: For users in the EU:
items: You can access the online conflict resolution platform of the EU at: http://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/
You have the right to present complaints to the consumer authority of your country
You can choose the legislation of your country of residence for any dispute

rights.title: 6. Rights and Restrictions
rights.subtitle: We reserve the right to:
items: Modify or interrupt the service without prior notice
Reject the service to any user
Delete content that violates these terms
Update prices with 30 days prior notice

dataProtection.title: 7. Data Protection
dataProtection.content: The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, in compliance with the RGPD (UE) 2016/679.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.subtitle: In the maximum extent permitted by law, Profit&Lost will not be responsible for:
items: Indirect or consequential damages
Loss of data or service interruption
Financial decisions based on the information provided

modifications.title: 9. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. The changes will come into effect immediately after their publication.

law.title: 10. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
law.subtitle: For users in the EU, these terms are governed by Spanish law and applicable European legislation. Notwithstanding the mandatory legislation of the user's country of residence, any dispute will be subject to:
items: The jurisdiction of the Spanish courts
The alternative dispute resolution mechanisms available in the EU
The consumer protection legislation of the user's country of residence

validity.title: 11. Validity and Nullity
validity.content: If any provision of these terms is declared null or inapplicable, such nullity will not affect the remaining provisions, which will remain fully effective and binding.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, contact: support@profit-lost.com

subscription.title: Subscription Plans
subscription.trialPeriod: When you register, you get 30 days of free access to all Premium features, with no need to add a card or commitment.
subscription.plansIntro: After 30 days, to continue using the app you must choose between:

monthly.title: Monthly
monthly.description: Flexible payment, cancel whenever you want

annual.title: Annual
annual.description: Save 16% compared to the monthly plan

subscription.cancellation: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the settings section of your account.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They allow us to remember your preferences and improve your navigation experience.

legalBasis.title: 2. Legal basis
legalBasis.content: In compliance with the Law 34/2002, of the Information Society and Electronic Commerce Service (LSSI-CE), and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) 2016/679, we inform you about the use of cookies on our website.

items.title: Technical cookies (necessary):
items.description: They allow navigation and the use of basic functions.

items.title: Analytical cookies:
items.description: They help us understand how users interact with the website (Google Analytics).

items.title: Authentication cookies:
items.description: They enable secure user authentication and maintain session information.

items.title: Preference cookies:
items.description: They store user preferences like language, theme, and display settings.

specificCookies.title: 4. Specific cookies used
specificCookies.subtitle: The following table details the specific cookies we use:

management.title: 5. Cookies management
management.content: You can configure your browser to reject all cookies or to receive a notification when a cookie is sent. However, some features of our website may not work correctly without cookies.

browsers.title: Instructions for managing cookies in major browsers:
items: Google Chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and other site data
Mozilla Firefox: Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
Microsoft Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-party cookies
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services that may set cookies on your device:
items: Google Analytics: website usage analysis. You can opt out of Google Analytics tracking by installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on available at: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

retention.title: 7. Cookies retention period
retention.content: Session cookies are deleted when the browser is closed. Persistent cookies remain on your device for a maximum period of 24 months.

rights.title: 8. Your rights
rights.content: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, deletion and opposition by contacting:

modifications.title: 9. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to update this cookie policy at any time. The changes will come into force immediately after their publication on the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.generalInfo: If you have any questions or suggestions, we are here to help you. Our team is committed to providing the best support possible to all our users.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support
technicalSupport.description: For technical questions, application issues or general help:
technicalSupport.responseTime: Usual response time: 24-48 hours working days

titleInfo.title: 1. Title information
titleInfo.subtitle: In compliance with the Law 34/2002, of the Information Society and Electronic Commerce Service (LSSI-CE):

object.title: 2. Object and scope of application
object.content: Profit&Lost is a web application dedicated to the management and visualization of personal financial data. This legal notice regulates the use of the website and the profit-lost.com application.

intellectual.title: 3. Intellectual and industrial property
intellectual.content: All intellectual and industrial property rights of this website, including its source code, design, navigation structure, databases and content, are property of Profit&Lost or have licenses for their use.

conditions.title: 4. Use conditions
conditions.subtitle: The user commits to:
items: Not to perform illegal or contrary to good faith activities
Not to disseminate content or propaganda of racist or xenophobic character
Not to cause technical problems to the platform
Not to use the platform to send advertising

responsibility.title: 5. Responsibility
responsibility.subtitle: Profit&Lost is not responsible for:
items: Decisions based on the information provided
The continuity and availability of the service
The presence of viruses or malicious programs
The improper use of the platform by third parties

legislation.title: 6. Applicable legislation
legislation.content: This legal notice is governed by the Spanish and European legislation. Any controversy will be resolved in the courts of Spain, without prejudice to the jurisdiction that corresponds according to consumer legislation.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this legal notice at any time. The changes will come into force from their publication on the website.

help.title: Help
help.howToStart: How to start using Profit & Lost?
help.howToStartDescription: Starting with Profit & Lost is very easy:
help.howToStartStep1: 1. Personalize your initial preferences to adapt them to your needs.
help.howToStartStep2: 2. Go to the 'Annual Report' section and create your categories to organize your financial movements.
help.howToStartStep3: 3. In 'Transactions', start recording your income and expenses to keep a detailed control.
help.manageAccountsDescription: In the 'Accounts' section, you have full control over your accounts. You can:
help.manageAccountsStep1: 1. Create new accounts for different purposes (e.g. bank accounts, savings, etc.).
help.manageAccountsStep2: 2. Edit existing accounts to adjust details like name or configuration.
help.manageAccountsStep3: 3. Customize each account with unique colors to easily identify it.
help.manageAccountsStep4: 4. Delete accounts that you no longer need.
help.manageAccountsStep5: 5. Hide accounts that you don't want to see in your reports.
help.categoriesWorkDescription: Categories are the key to keeping your finances organized. With them you can:
help.categoriesWorkStep1: 1. Create custom categories according to your needs.
help.categoriesWorkStep2: 2. Assign colors to them to easily identify them in your graphs and reports.
help.categoriesWorkStep3: 3. Use them to classify and analyze your financial movements effectively.
help.protectData: How do I protect my data in Profit & Lost?
help.protectDataDescription: Profit & Lost prioritizes the security of your data:
help.protectDataStep1: 1. All information is encrypted to ensure its protection.
help.protectDataStep2: 2. You can change your password at any time from the 'Security & Privacy' section.
help.protectDataStep3: 3. Activate two-factor authentication for greater security.
help.viewReports: How do I view my financial reports?
help.viewReportsDescription: In the 'Reports' section, you can generate detailed reports that include:
help.viewReportsStep1: 1. Monthly or annual summaries of your movements.
help.viewReportsStep2: 2. Graphical analysis of your expenses and income by category.
help.viewReportsStep3: 3. Download reports in formats like PDF or Excel for review at any time.
help.mobileUsage: Can I use Profit & Lost on my mobile?
help.mobileUsageDescription: Yes! Profit & Lost is optimized for mobile devices. You just need to access our platform from your mobile browser entering profit-lost.com to enjoy all the features.
help.mobileUsageStep1: You can put the direct access to our web on your home screen so it appears as an app on your device.
help.contactSupportDescription: Our support team is here to help you. You can contact us through:
help.contactSupportStep2: Consult our online documentation to find detailed guides and quick solutions.

securityPrivacy.title: Security & Privacy
securityPrivacy.deleteAccountConfirmation: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted permanently.

intro.title: Welcome to Your Financial Command Center
content: This is your main panel, designed to give you a clear and complete view of your current financial situation.
📊 Get a quick overview of your income, expenses, and balance for the current month compared to the previous one.
📈 Analyze trends with the interactive chart of the last 6 months to make better decisions.
🔄 Quickly access your latest transactions without needing to change sections.
💡 Get a global perspective of your finances to better plan your economic future.

chart.noDataLast6Months: No data available for the last 6 months

history.noDataLastTransactions: No data available for the last transactions

intro.title: Annual Financial Analysis
content: Discover a complete and detailed view of your financial year with advanced analysis and personalized trends.
💰 Visualize the complete picture of your annual income and expenses with an intuitive breakdown.
📈 Analyze the month-by-month evolution to identify seasonal patterns in your finances.
🎯 Automatically detect trends and patterns in your spending habits to optimize your budget.
📋 Manage and customize your categories to adapt the analysis to your specific needs.
💡 Make smarter financial decisions based on real data and clear visualizations.

categories.title: Categories
categories.addCategoryBanner: 📊 Create your first category to start tracking your finances 📊

delete.title: Delete Category
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the category
delete.warning: Note: Categories with associated transactions cannot be deleted. You must first reassign or delete those transactions.

accounts.title: Accounts

intro.title: Total Control of Your Accounts
content: Centralize and monitor all your financial accounts in a single intuitive and customizable space.
💳 Manage multiple banking, savings, and investment accounts in one platform.
💰 Visualize your total assets with a detailed breakdown by account and asset type.
📊 Analyze the optimal distribution of your money with interactive charts and comparisons.
⚡ Instantly access all your financial information from any device.
🎨 Customize the visualization of each account with colors and labels for quick identification.
🔄 Keep constant track of your balances to avoid overdrafts and optimize your resources.

accounts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the account

errors.invalidYear: Invalid year. Must be between 1900 and 9999
errors.yearExists: This year already exists in the account

accounts.pendingYear: You have 1 pending year to save

intro.title: Intelligent Transaction Management
content: Organize and control all your financial transactions with advanced tools and clear visualizations.
📝 Easily record income and expenses with an intuitive and fast system.
🗂️ Automatically classify your transactions with customized categories for precise analysis.
📅 Visualize month-by-month details with advanced filters to find exactly what you're looking for.
📊 Analyze spending patterns with interactive charts that reveal saving opportunities.
🔍 Maintain detailed control of each transaction with powerful searches and filters.
💡 Identify areas for improvement in your finances with personalized suggestions based on your habits.

errors.recurrenceRequired: You must specify the recurrence type and end date
errors.invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date

table.addTransactionBanner: 💰 Add your first transaction of the month 💰

intro.title: Financial Notes
content: Your personal space to organize ideas, goals, and reminders related to your finances.
📝 Create detailed notes about financial decisions, goals, and personal strategies.
⏰ Set important reminders for payments, due dates, and financial opportunities.
📌 Save relevant information about investments, loans, and long-term financial goals.
✏️ Customize and organize your notes with an intuitive editor and formatting options.
🔍 Quickly find any information with advanced searches and filters.
🔄 Sync your notes across devices to have access to your financial information anywhere.
